commit message: Some graphical enhancements. New notification icon, with correct dimensions for l/m/h/xh/xxhdpi resolutions
Rename org.mustard.android to org.mumod.android to be able, to add it in play store

- 2012-11-25
* replies to account will now be marked
* more graphical adjustments
- 2012-11-24
* additional german translations
* some graphical adjustments
* changed layout of dents

- 2012-11-30
* graphical adjustments
* options for own consumer key, consumer secret, instance
* show/hide source on the bottom of dents option
(Settings -> Global Settings -> 'Display source in dents')

- 2012-12-02
* New option: Repeat + Fav will Repeat and Fav the dent with only one
click
* New options: Ask for block a user, ask for repeat a dent

- 2012-12-07
* Implemented 'Reply All' option
- 2012-12-06
* New font sizes

* Changed font from Roboto-Regular to Roboto-Light
* Changed default font size to normal instead of small

Finished todo in MustardBaseActivity, for highlighting dents where
username is called
Added translation option for spam report.
Added option to include/exclude user id of spammer in spamreport
Replace redent symbol to RT (Roboto-Light is unable to show the symbol)
Implemenent of using own yourls installations for url shortening
Add new layout fields to display user screen_name who repeated a notice.
When displaying repeated notice, display the original one with mention of who repeated it. Makes display clearer and ease actions like repeat, favorite, etc...

When receiving repeated notice, extract and store the original one. Keep track of repeated timestamp to keep display coherence. Keep track of repeated status_id to be able to load previous timeline 'page'.

Merge pull request #25 from jbfavre/master

Enhance display for repeated notices
Forgot repeated_by field in User layout.

Merge pull request #26 from jbfavre/master

Better display for RTs. Forgot user layout
Added some changes, to create a working upgrade
Fixes (for FDroid Repo) for using StatusNet instacens buildable without any keys
Added option to add own consumer informations

* Added private messaging (experimental)
* Added slidemenue (https://github.com/jfeinstein10/SlidingMenu/)
* Removed obsolet oauth options

* Added option to define slidemenu margin
* Changes slidemenu right/left to boolean
** (If Mustard {MOD} crashes after update, please reinstall)
Added option to display an icon instead of RT by
Twitter fixes and Update to API 1.1
Twitter fixes and Update to API 1.1
